messages.subject: Mod post
messages.msgSnippet: Due to some idiot pr0n spammer I had to change the group settings so that only a moderator can post files. If anyone wants to  have a fanfic or whatever im the
messages.messageBody:
Due to some idiot pr0n spammer I had to change the group settings so
that only a moderator can post files. If anyone wants to have a
fanfic or whatever im the files archive just let me know and I'll get
it in for you.

Barb Sheridan

bsher213(AT)bellatlantic(DOT)net
